title: Settings
description: Manage your account, security and preferences

overview.title: Welcome to Settings
overview.description: Use the left menu to navigate between different account configuration sections.
overview.profileDescription: Manage your personal information, name, email and basic preferences.
overview.passwordDescription: Change your current password for a new and more secure one.
overview.securityDescription: Configure two-factor authentication and review your active sessions.
overview.notificationsDescription: Customize how and when to receive email and push notifications.
overview.billingDescription: Manage your subscription, payment methods and invoices.
overview.api-keysDescription: Manage API keys for external integration and access control.
overview.teamsDescription: Manage your teams, members and invitations.
overview.plansDescription: Compare plans and upgrade your subscription.

layout.title: Settings
layout.description: Manage your account, security and preferences

profile.title: Personal Information
profile.description: Manage your personal information and basic account preferences.

error.message: Error loading profile information. Please try again.

form.title: Personal Data
form.description: Update your name, country, timezone and preferred language

danger.title: Danger Zone
danger.warning: These actions cannot be undone. Proceed with caution.
danger.dialogDescription: You are about to permanently delete your account and all associated data.
danger.dialogWarning: This action is irreversible and cannot be undone.
danger.dialogDetail: All your profile information, settings and any other data will be permanently deleted from our servers.

password.title: Change Password
password.description: Choose a new secure password for your account.

success.title: Password Updated!
success.description: Your password has been updated successfully.

form.title: New Password
form.description: Update your password with a new and more secure one.

main.title: Security Settings
main.description: Manage two-factor authentication and security alerts for your account.

twoFactor.title: Two-Factor Authentication (2FA)
twoFactor.description: Add an extra layer of security to your account
twoFactor.disabledStatus: We recommend enabling 2FA for better security
twoFactor.recommendation: We recommend enabling two-factor authentication to protect your account.

alerts.title: Security Alerts
alerts.loginDescription: We'll notify you by email about logins from new devices or locations

sessions.title: Active Sessions
sessions.description: Review and manage devices that have access to your account.

terminateDialog.title: Terminate Session
terminateDialog.description: Are you sure you want to terminate this session? The device will need to sign in again.

loginHistory.title: Login History
loginHistory.description: Review recent login attempts to your account.

messages.saveSuccessDescription: Your security settings have been saved successfully.
messages.saveErrorDescription: There was a problem saving your settings. Please try again.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.description: Manage your email and push notification preferences.

main.title: Notification Settings
main.description: Manage how and when you receive email and push notifications.

email.title: Email Notifications
email.description: Sent to your primary email address

loginAlerts.title: New sign-ins
loginAlerts.description: We'll notify you when someone accesses from a new device

passwordChanges.title: Password changes
passwordChanges.description: Confirmation when you change your password

mentions.title: Mentions and comments
mentions.description: When someone mentions you or comments on your projects

projectUpdates.title: Project updates
projectUpdates.description: Important changes in projects you follow

teamInvites.title: Team invitations
teamInvites.description: When you're invited to join a team

newsletter.title: Weekly newsletter
newsletter.description: Summary of new features and tips

messages.saveSuccessDescription: Your notification preferences have been saved successfully.
messages.saveErrorDescription: There was a problem saving your preferences. Please try again.

billing.title: Billing
billing.description: Manage your subscription, payment methods and invoices.

currentPlan.title: Current Plan
currentPlan.description: Your current subscription and usage limits

upgrade.title: Need more features?
upgrade.description: Upgrade to Pro for higher limits and advanced features
upgrade.explore: Explore our Pro and Enterprise plans

paymentMethod.title: Payment Method
paymentMethod.addCard: Add a card to upgrade your plan

billingHistory.title: Billing History
billingHistory.noInvoicesDescription: Invoices will appear here when you have an active subscription

empty.title: No invoices yet

features.title: Free Plan Features

messages.addPaymentForm: Opening form to add payment method

teams.noTeams: You don't belong to any team yet.
